Make a Difference Today

Your contribution directly fuels our projects and brings smiles to Uganda's youth.

Choose a Campaign to Support

Every donation, no matter the size, creates a ripple of positive change. Below are our active campaigns where you can contribute directly to a cause that resonates with you. Your generosity empowers education, protects our environment, and supports the most vulnerable children.

Educate the Futures of 100 Ugandan Students

Help us provide school fees, uniforms, and supplies for 100 students, giving them the tools they need to succeed and build a brighter future.

Donate Now

Help Us Grow A Greener Uganda

Support our tree-planting initiative to combat deforestation, improve air quality, and teach the next generation about environmental stewardship.

Donate Now

Supporting Refugee Children

Provide essential aid, including food, shelter, and trauma-informed educational support for refugee children who have been displaced from their homes.

Donate Now

Bringing Hope and Education to Kagadi Kenga

Fund the construction of a new classroom block and provide learning materials for the remote community of Kagadi Kenga, opening doors to education.

Donate Now

WM Smile Generation

Nurturing minds and growing futures for the children and youth of Uganda.
